document_data.name: Elan Tanor'Thal
document_data.mainbody: '''Elan Tanor'Thal''' was a [[drow]] wizard of [[House Tanor'Thal]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Elan was a student of the magical academy on the [[Dweomercore]] level.
document_data.History:
House Tanor'Thal once ruled a successful slaving ring in [[Skullport]] until the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] destroyed them.
In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Elan was at the Dweomercore studying magic.
document_data.Personality: Elan's objective was to gain enough magical power to conquer Skullport for his family. He was a typical treacherous drow; at first he appeared friendly to people, only to betray them later.
